de.undercouch.citeproc

Interface ItemDataProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BibTeXItemDataProvider, CompoundItemDataProvider, EndNoteItemDataProvider, ListItemDataProvider, RISItemDataProvider

    public interface ItemDataProvider
    Retrieves citation items
    Author:
    Michel Kraemer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String[] getIds() 
      CSLItemData retrieveItem(String id)
      Retrieve a citation item with a given ID

    • Method Detail

      • retrieveItem

        CSLItemData retrieveItem(String id)
        Retrieve a citation item with a given ID
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getIds

        String[] getIds()
        Returns:
